feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 release candidate 1 available

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin Core 0.13.0 release candidate 1 available
entry.summary: Bitcoin Core has released version 0.13.0rc1, which is available for download from the official website. This release contains new features, bug fixes, and other improvements. Users can access the source code on GitHub under the signed tag. The release candidate is a test version of the release, and when no critical issues are found, it will be tagged as 0.13.0. Preliminary release notes for the version can be found on GitHub. Users can report any bugs using the issue tracker on GitHub. As a cryptocurrency, Bitcoin requires a secure and efficient system to function properly. With the latest version, users can expect enhanced features and improved security measures. By downloading the new version, users can take advantage of these upgrades and contribute to the community by reporting any issues they may encounter. Overall, the release of Bitcoin Core version 0.13.0rc1 is a significant step forward in the development of the cryptocurrency.
